content: I'm looking for some advice on organizing my coupons and discounts. I've been using a few different apps and websites to find deals, and I'm starting to get a bit overwhelmed. Do you have any tips on how to keep track of all these offers? By the way, just last week I used a 20% off coupon on a purchase of $50 or more at Target, which helped me save around $12 on a bunch of household essentials.
